It provides a wide range of components, including tabs and pills, which allow users to navigate through different sections of a webpage. This documentation will guide you on how to use tabs and pills in Bootstrap 5.3. ### Objective and Scope The objective of this documentation is to provide step-by-step instructions on using tabs and pills in Bootstrap 5.3. It covers the requirements, pre-requisites, and best practices for implementing tabs and pills in your web projects. ### Requirements and Pre-requisites To use tabs and pills in Bootstrap 5.3, you need the following: - Bootstrap 5.3 CSS and JavaScript files - HTML and CSS knowledge - Text editor or integrated development environment (IDE) ### Step-by-Step Instructions 1.
